content.question: What happens when you press 5?

choices.label: You can leave a voice message.
You can listen to the options again.
You can find a nearby store location.
You can hear the business hours.

content.answer: You can listen to the options again.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
